Parameters: int: the ID of the notification

from(android.content.Context).Description: Get a @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationManagerCompat_E@ instance for a provided context.

Parameters: int: the ID of the notification

ClassDesc: Compatibility library for NotificationManager with fallbacks for older platforms. To use this class, call the static function @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationManagerCompat#from_E@ to get a @B_android#support#v4#app#NotificationManagerCompat_E@ object, and then call one of its methods to post or cancel notifications.
